title: Repo sync

details: Clarified table of contents icon label as "Outline" in markdown files for better accessibility.
Updated short title for secret scanning regex generator from "Regular expression generator" to "Generate regular expressions".
Added functionality to assign security campaign alerts to users or Copilot for automatic fixes.

Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
